name: Remittance Reliance
title: Top Remittance Receiver
description: In 2022, personal remittances accounted for 41.94% of Tonga's GDP, highlighting the country's significant reliance on money sent from abroad.

name: Debt Dilemma
title: Manageable External Debt
description: As of 2023, Tonga's total external debt stood at $196.45 million, with long-term and publicly guaranteed debt at $151.36 million, indicating a relatively low debt burden.

name: Tax Titans
title: High Tax Revenue from Goods and Services
description: In 2023, taxes on goods and services contributed 25.56% to the value added of industry and services, showcasing a robust tax collection system.

name: Trademark Tumble
title: Low Trademark Activity
description: In 2021, Tonga had only 3 resident trademark applications, indicating limited domestic innovation and brand development.

name: Consumption Crunch
title: Decline in Household Expenditure
description: Household consumption expenditure saw a significant decline of 20.98% in 2022, reflecting economic challenges faced by the population.

name: Pollution Price
title: Particulate Emission Damage Costs
description: In 2021, Tonga faced $1.56 million in damages due to particulate emissions, highlighting environmental challenges.

name: Female Employers
title: Prominent Female Employers
description: In 2023, 17.45% of employed females in Tonga were employers, showcasing a strong presence of women in leadership roles.

name: Youthful Male Demographic
title: Small Young Male Population
description: In 2023, males aged 30-34 made up only 4.54% of the male population, indicating a smaller young adult demographic.
